seo_data.meta_title: 14 Day Group Tour in India | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Uncover India's magic! Experience Delhi and Rajasthan's vibrant culture, awe-inspiring architecture, exotic foods, and desert adventures. It's a journey bursting with unforgettable memories and experiences!

open_graph.title: 14 Day Group Tour in India with Culture, Taj Mahal & Adventure | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: Uncover India's magic! Experience Delhi and Rajasthan's vibrant culture, awe-inspiring architecture, exotic foods, and desert adventures. It's a journey bursting with unforgettable memories and experiences!

tour_information.description: Uncover India's magic! Experience Delhi and Rajasthan's vibrant culture, awe-inspiring architecture, exotic foods, and desert adventures. It's a journey bursting with unforgettable memories and experiences!
activities_incl: Delhi City Tour Including Sikh Mega
Sunrise & Sunset at the Taj Mahal
Mehrangarh Fort Visit With Audio Guide
Bike Ride & Walks Through Local Villages & Farms

day1.title: Arrive in India!
day1.desc: Step into India, a vivid world of remarkable cultures, delectable cuisines, warm-hearted locals, diverse landscapes, and stunning architecture steeped in history. Witness the everyday magic—from the sacred Ganges to the breathtaking Taj Mahal. Your journey starts in the vibrant heart of New Delhi. Join your guide for a welcome dinner, where you'll relish the authentic, rich flavors of Indian cuisine. Welcome to your Indian adventure!

day2.title: Delhi Day Tour & Street Food Tour
day2.desc: After breakfast, we’ll head out with our local guide through the streets of Delhi and get our first real introduction into Indian life. Our first stop is a beautiful Sikh Temple, you’ll then step into the huge mass kitchen, where Sikh’s provide free meals daily to residents of the city. Watch how thousands of Chapatis are made and stir the giant curry pots yourself. After lunch, we’ll then head to the illustrious Lotus Temple. In the evening, you'll transfer to Old Delhi with a guide who offers local insights and Indian sweets. Ride rickshaws through Chandni Chowk’s vibrant "Moonlit Market" to Mutton Street, where you'll enjoy skewers and Islamic cuisine.

day3.title: Agra, Sunset at the Taj Mahal
day3.desc: After breakfast we’ll check out and jump on a train to Agra. On arrival we’ll check into our hotel and relax, then in the afternoon we’ll take Tuk Tuks to a quiet garden south of the Taj to view this magnificent structure away from the crowds at sunset. Tomorrow we’ll head inside, but today is all about enjoying the beauty that this building has to offer. We’ll grab dinner in the evening and get an early night as we are up for sunrise tomorrow.

day4.title: Agra, Sunrise Taj Mahal & Bollywood Movie
day4.desc: Begin your day at dawn with a peaceful visit to the Taj Mahal, where your guide will highlight key spots, including Princess Diana’s photo location, and share its romantic history. After breakfast, take a bus to Jaipur, the Pink City, which features 18th-century palaces, forts, gardens, pastel buildings, and bustling bazaars. Enjoy vibrant cuisine and experience rich Rajasthani culture through colorful attire and folk traditions. In the evening, watch a Bollywood movie in a grand theater.

day6.title: Pushkar, Blessing on the Lake
day6.desc: After breakfast in the morning, we’ll take the train to Ajmer before transferring to Pushkar, known as one of the holiest towns in India. Pushkar is a backpacker’s paradise with amazing food, beautiful markets, rolling landscapes, hiking and unrivalled sunsets. Tonight we sleep in the desert on a gorgeous glamping site. In the afternoon, a local Brahmin will induct you to Pushkar properly with a blessing on the holy lake and we’ll then grab a drink at a lakeside cafe before heading back to camp to sleep under the stars.
activities_incl: Pushkar Orientation Walk & Brahmin Blessing by Holy Lake

day7.title: Udaipur, Sunset Cruise on Lake Pichola
day7.desc: Today we’ll take a bus to Udaipur, the “White City” – also known as the city of lakes. It is also the location for filming the James Bond film, Octopussy! The lakes and architecture provide a perfect balance between the hectic and the tranquil and no better way to experience this is with a walk through the markets and old town and finishing with a private sunset cruise on the lake. Afterwards, we’ll then head to one of our favourite rooftop restaurants for dinner.
activities_incl: Sunset Boat Cruise on Lake Pichola

day8.title: Udaipur, Bike Tour & Cooking Demonstration
day8.desc: An early start today as we head out of town to take a fantastic bike ride. Our guide is from the local village and so will introduce you to the ways the locals live, teach you about their culture and heritage as well as show us the local temples important to village life. We’ll also get to visit a local school during our time in this area. You'll have some free time in the afternoon before heading back to camp at sunset to work with local villagers learning how to cook traditional Indian cuisine.

day9.title: On to Jodhpur
day9.desc: Today we take a bus to the home of the blue city, Jodhpur. On arrival in the evening, we’ll transfer to our traditional Haveli accommodation. Our Haveli is situated in the middle of the blue city where the walls are painted blue throughout this labyrinth of buildings in the shadow of the ever imposing Mehrangarh Fort. After checking in, we’ll meet on the rooftop for dinner to catch our first glimpse of one of our favourite cities in Rajasthan.

day10.title: Mehrangarh Fort & the Blue City
day10.desc: We’ll give you the morning free to relax after travelling yesterday. We’ll meet in the early afternoon and walk to the Mehrangarh fort together with our local guide. After, we’ll walk through the blue city and stop off at the Jodhpur stepwell, an impressive feat of ancient stone work before walking around the clock tower market to sample some famous Saffron Lassi and delicious samosas. We’ll then make our way back to our accommodation to finish the day.

day11.title: Safari in the Dunes & Camel Research Centre
day11.desc: Once we arrive in Bikaner, we’ll check in to our fantastic accommodation and grab some breakfast before we head out for the day to explore Camel Country. Bikaner is home to some fantastic sand dunes, so we’ll venture out on a jeep safari for an incredible and bumpy ride you’ll never forget! Afterwards we’ll visit the Camel Research Centre, Bikaner is home to some of the world’s best riding camels and one of the world’s largest camel research and breeding farms. We’ll finish the day with a delicious dinner before getting some well deserved rest.

day12.title: City Walk and Overnight Train to Delhi
day12.desc: After a free morning, check out and join a walking tour of central Bikaner. Explore narrow alleys, historic architecture, bustling markets, and vibrant bazaars with spices, textiles, handicrafts, and sweets. Visit artisan workshops for pottery, carpet weaving, and jewelry making, showcasing Bikaner’s rich traditions. After dinner, take an overnight train to Delhi.

day13.title: Final India Dinner
day13.desc: On your arrival in Delhi, you will be transferred from the train station to your final hotel. You will have the afternoon free to do as you please before meeting with your group to enjoy your final dinner in India.

day14.title: Depart
day14.desc: Your local guide can help you arrange transport to the airport to whatever destination you are off to next. We hope we have shown you why India is a dream location and should be at the top of everyone’s bucket lists. Have a safe journey to wherever you are off to next and always remember to #exploremore.

Sunrise & sunset at the Taj Mahal
Cooking Demo & Dinner at Seven Women

day5.title: Pink City, Hawa Mahal
day5.desc: After breakfast in the hotel, our guide will meet us to take us on an orientation walk of the old town. We’ll get to visit the local market, understand the origins of the “Pink City”, meet some locals and market traders, learn all about the spices that are synonymous to Indian cooking and view the excellent Palace of the Winds. We’ll then all jump in Tuk Tuks to visit Galta-Ji, or otherwise known as the Monkey Temple. A temple built into the hills that is the home to hundreds of grey long tailed Asian monkeys. You will have the rest of the day free to explore the other sites of Jaipur.

day12.title: City Walk and Overnight Train to Delhi
day12.desc: After a free morning, check out and join a walking tour of central Bikaner. Explore narrow alleys, historic architecture, bustling markets, and vibrant bazaars with spices, textiles, handicrafts, and sweets. Visit artisan workshops for pottery, carpet weaving, and jewelry making, showcasing Bikaner’s rich traditions. After dinner, take an overnight train to Delhi.

day13.title: Final India Dinner
day13.desc: On your arrival in Delhi, you will be transferred from the train station to your final hotel. You will have the afternoon free to do as you please before meeting with your group to enjoy your final dinner in India.

day14.title: Let's go to Nepal!
day14.desc: This morning, transfer to Delhi Airport for your flight to Kathmandu. Say goodbye to India and hello to Nepal! Upon arrival, begin the final part of your tour in the vibrant capital. In the evening, enjoy a welcome dinner at an authentic Nepali restaurant in Thamel Bazaar, savoring local flavors in this lively cultural hotspot.

day15.title: Exploring Kathmandu
day15.desc: Explore vibrant Kathmandu on our city tour, where ancient traditions meet modern life. Visit iconic Kathmandu Durbar Square, the serene Swoyambhunath Stupa (Monkey Temple) with panoramic views, and Patan Durbar Square’s exquisite temples and artisan shops. End your day with a unique cooking demonstration and dinner at Seven Women, supporting empowered local women.
activities_incl: Cooking demo and dinner at Seven Women

day16.title: Journey to Chitwan National Park
day16.desc: After breakfast, head to Chitwan National Park, a UNESCO World Heritage Site bursting with rhinos, tigers, elephants, and over 500 bird species! Explore one of Asia’s top parks and see these incredible animals up close in their natural habitat. Settle into your cozy lodge surrounded by lush greenery and the sounds of nature. In the evening, relax and soak in the peaceful vibes of this amazing wildlife sanctuary.

day17.title: Chitwan Adventures
day17.desc: Dive into Chitwan National Park with our thrilling jungle activities. Start your day with a 1-hour jungle walk to see vibrant flora and wildlife up close. Enjoy a 45-minute canoe ride on the tranquil river, then embark on a 4-hour jeep safari to spot rhinos, tigers, and colorful birds. Experience the unique sight of rhinos roaming the town streets, showcasing the harmony between humans and wildlife.

day18.title: Discover Pokhara!
day18.desc: Travel to Pokhara, the Gateway to the Himalayas, nestled in the Annapurna foothills. Enjoy an evening walk around Phewa Lake, visit Tal Barahi Temple, explore charming fisherman villages, and browse vibrant bazaars filled with colorful handicrafts and delicious street food. Admire the stunning mountain reflections and immerse yourself in the local culture.

day19.title: Trek to Australian Camp
day19.desc: Set out on a 5-6 hour scenic trek to Australian Camp through lush rhododendron forests, terraced farmlands, and traditional villages. Enjoy breathtaking views of the Annapurna Mountain Range, spot vibrant wildlife, and experience indigenous culture. Perfect for hikers and nature lovers, this unforgettable journey offers stunning vistas and rich cultural experiences.

day20.title: Return to Kathmandu
day20.desc: Today, bid farewell to the serene beauty of Pokhara and journey back to Kathmandu. Reflect on Nepal’s vibrant culture, warm-hearted locals, and breathtaking landscapes that made your adventure extraordinary. This unforgettable week exploring Nepal will leave you with cherished memories to last a lifetime.

seo_data.meta_title: 14 Day Small Group Tour in Japan | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Born out of huge demand, this is our incredibly popular 14-day Japan trip. This itinerary includes some more of the most iconic areas of Japan and really gets off of the tourist trail.

open_graph.title: 14 Day Group Tour in Japan with Temples, Culture & Adventure | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: We offer a popular 14-day Japan journey. It covers iconic, offbeat locales, letting you experience Japan's essence. Highlights include an overnight stay in a Koyasan monastery, Osaka Castle gardens, interacting with Nara's wildlife, and a guided tour of Hiroshima's history. A comprehensive trip for those seeking a full experience.

tour_information.description: Born out of huge demand, this is our incredibly popular 14-day Japan trip. This itinerary includes some more of the most iconic areas of Japan and really gets off of the tourist trail.

day1.title: Arrive IN Tokyo!
day1.desc: Just arrived in Japan, a land of vivid culture, history, and technology, with snow-capped mountains and temples awash in incense. After 2pm, check into your hotel in Tokyo. We'll then savour Japanese cuisine, meet our group, and explore Senso-ji in Asakusa after crowds have dispersed—a sensory feast at this iconic temple. Welcome to this world of wonder.

day2.title: Tokyo Day Tour
day2.desc: We'll kick off with a succinct briefing, encompassing Japanese customs, language, and tour details. Post briefing, we're off to Harajuku, the cradle of Japanese teen pop culture. Traditional bento lunches will accompany us to Yoyogi Park, home to the stunning Meiji Shrine. Then it's off to Akihabara, Tokyo's vibrant electric town. Expect a neon wonderland, intriguing shops, and a challenge in the Sega Centre, along with a guide map for your own exploration.

day3.title: Sushi Making Class & Shijuku!
day3.desc: We explore the world famous Tsukiji Fish Market before heading to our sushi class where we’ll learn how to hand roll the perfect sushi, make delicious miso soup and even try our hand at frying some teriyaki fish. This evening we head to Shinjuku, we’ll see an unparalleled skyline of Tokyo, check out the famous Omoide Yokocho alley & grab some dinner. before viewing the famous Shibuya Pedestrian Crossing.

day4.title: Travel to Hakone & MT Fuji Viewing
day4.desc: Departing Tokyo today via the "Romance Car," we'll settle in Hakone's mountain guesthouse. The day will be spent exploring, with the added bonus of spectacular Mt. Fuji views. After photographing Japan's iconic peak, we'll enjoy a traditional Nabe dinner and watch a breathtaking sunset from the rooftop deck over this quaint town.

day5.title: Temple Stay
day5.desc: Today, we'll embark on a bullet train to Nagoya, followed by a scenic journey showcasing majestic mountains en route to Takayama, a UNESCO World Heritage town. Our stay tonight is a remarkable Japanese temple with tatami mat beds and serene garden views. Post-afternoon Sake tasting and indulging in delectable Hida beef, the temple's tranquility offers a mindful, restful experience.

day6.title: Arrive in Kyoto & Gion Walking Tour
day6.desc: Morning finds us exploring Takayama's old town and riverside morning market. Post-lunch, we'll journey via train to Nagoya, then take a bullet train to Kyoto, known for its temples, shrines and Geishas. The evening unfolds in Kyoto's Gion district, famed for Geishas—an intriguing traditional art form. With luck, we might spot one during our stroll.

day7.title: Kyoto Temple & Shrine Tour
day7.desc: We’ll rise before dawn and take the subway to the Fushimi-Inari Shrine. We arrive early to escape the throng of tourists and work our way through the mountain exploring corridors of never ending red gates. Afterwards, we will head to Kiyomizu-dera temple, one of Japan’s most famous temples. A stunning bamboo and wooden complex that sits high in the mountain side. We finish up with a traditional Tea Ceremony, where you can even rent kimonos!

day8.title: Golden Pavillion, Zen Garden & Kendo Class
day8.desc: Today starts at the mesmerising Golden Pavilion, a lake-enclosed, gold-emblazoned spectacle. We then visit Daitoku-Ji, a serene complex of ancient temples. Our afternoon comprises a traditional Kendo class, led by an authentic Bushido instructor with Samurai lineage. A tranquil 10-minute guided meditation caps off an unforgettable day.
activities_incl: Kendo Class & Guided Meditation in Dojo

day9.title: Arrive In Osaka, Bamboo Forest, Food Tour & Karaoke
day9.desc: We start today with a train ride to scenic Arashiyama, visiting the photogenic bamboo forest and Monkey Mountain. Following a traditional Japanese boat exploration, we head to Osaka. After check-in, we immerse ourselves in Dotonbori's sensory feast: light, colour, food, and vibrant locals. Experiencing the city through its flavours, the night ends with a classic Japanese tradition—Karaoke!

day10.title: Osaka Castle & Shinseka
day10.desc: Post last night's revelry, it's farewell time for those ending their journey, while those staying on enjoy a free morning in Osaka. Explore trendsetting AmericaTown, Shinsaibashi Shopping district, rejuvenating Spa World, or Den-Den Town's electronic wonderland. We regroup to visit Osaka Castle, ensconced in verdant gardens, for a sunset view, followed by dinner in Shinsekai, Dotonbori's charming counterpart.

day11.title: Nara Park & Koyosan Temple Stay
day11.desc: Starting early, we take a 30-minute train to Nara, a city symbiotic with deer and rich in history. After a tranquil park and temple tour, we return to Osaka, collect our bags, and travel to Koyasan. Nestled in a mountain's heart, this temple town, with its verdant nature, embodies cosmic connection. Experience monastic life, learn about the dedicated monks, explore numerous temples and shrines, and savour a special locally-sourced vegetarian meal prepared by the monks.

day12.title: Morning In Koyosan 7 Travel to Hiroshima
day12.desc: Awake to nature's symphony and join the monks in morning prayers, followed by a traditional temple breakfast. After relishing our last morning in this enchanting locale, we journey back to Osaka, then on to Hiroshima via bullet train. Post settling in, we'll visit the poignant Hiroshima Peace Memorial Park, where our local guide will recount the city's impactful history. A tour of the museum and dinner cap off an unforgettable day.

day13.title: Miyajima Island
day13.desc: We start a bit later today, heading to the serene Miyajima Island, an hour away from Hiroshima. We'll ferry across, tour its forests and ancient temples, including the partly submerged Great Torii Gate. Post a leisurely island stroll and lunch, we'll return to Hiroshima. The evening marks our final group outing, concluding an unforgettable Japanese tour.

day14.title: Depart
day14.desc: And that’s a wrap! Today we finish in the beautiful city of Hiroshima, take one final walk around the memorial park or a go for a sunrise run along the river. Your guide will assist you in your onward travel whether you continue to travel around Japan, head back home or join us on another tour in a different, but equally incredible place.

seo_data.meta_title: 11 Day Morocco Group Tour | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Embark on an extraordinary adventure in Morocco and discover a land where the Sahara Desert meets the majestic Atlas Mountains, and where ancient cities beckon you to explore their winding alleys and bustling souks.

open_graph.title: 11 Day Group Tour in Morocco with Sahara, Markets & Adventure | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: Embark on an extraordinary adventure in Morocco and discover a land where the Sahara Desert meets the majestic Atlas Mountains, and where ancient cities beckon you to explore their winding alleys and bustling souks.

tour_information.description: Embark on an extraordinary adventure in Morocco and discover a land where the Sahara Desert meets the majestic Atlas Mountains, and where ancient cities beckon you to explore their winding alleys and bustling souks.
activities_incl: Ait Ben Haddou Village Walk (Game of Thrones)
Todra Valley and Gorges in Tinghir
Traditional Berber Music by the Bonfire

day1.title: Welcome to Magical Morocco
day1.desc: You made it to Morocco! Get ready for an amazing adventure. Once you land at Marrakech airport, our driver will be there with a big smile to greet you and whisk you away to a beautiful Riad in the heart of the old city. It will feel like stepping onto a movie set. In the evening, we’ll treat you to a special welcome dinner at a traditional Moroccan restaurant near the famous square of Jemaa el Fna. Get ready for a feast fit for royalty.

day2.title: Let's Explore Marrakech
day2.desc: Today is all about immersing yourself in the vibrant energy of Marrakech. Our knowledgeable tour guides will take you on a full-day adventure through the old Medina. We’ll visit iconic spots like Jemaa El Fna Square, the impressive Koutoubia Mosque (from the outside), the historic Saadian Tombs, the magnificent Bahia Palace and the beautiful Ben Youssef Madrassa. But that’s not all! We’ll also take you to cool hidden gems in Medina, like a local bakery (Ferran), a Farnatchi and a Foundouk or Caravanserai.Feeling hungry? In the early afternoon, we’ll take you to Amal restaurant, a fantastic non-profit organisation that empowers women with culinary skills. And of course, you’ll have plenty of free time to explore the vibrant Souks, bargain like a pro and visit the famous Henna Cafe. Don’t forget to treat yourself to a refreshing cup of traditional Moroccan mint tea, also known as “Berber whiskey.” You deserve it!

day3.title: Marrakech, Ouarzazate, Kasbah Ait Ben Haddou, Dades Valley
day3.desc: Road Trip Time. Get ready for some jaw-dropping scenic views as we hit the road through the majestic High Atlas Mountains. Our first stop is the incredibly scenic Ait Ben Haddou village. Yep, you guessed it – it’s the same place that made an appearance in Game of Thrones. While exploring the ancient Kasbah, we will take some epic pictures and then have time to grab some lunch. As if that’s not enough, we’ll then cruise through the charming Rose Valley on our way to our next location. Our day will wrap up with a cosy hotel check-in in Dades Valley, just in time to catch the beautiful sunset over the magical scenery.
activities_incl: Ait Ben Haddou village walk (Game of Thrones)

day4.title: Dades Valley, Todra Gorge, Merzouga Desert
day4.desc: Time to hit the road again and this time we’re off to the majestic Sahara Desert. But first we’ve got a few stops along the way. First up, the quirky Monkey Toes rock formation in Dades Valley – you’ll want to snap a few pics of this! Then, we’ll explore the stunning Todra Valley and Gorges in Tinghir. It will feel like stepping into a painting. After that, prepare for a camel ride like no other. We’ll take you into the heart of the desert dunes to witness the most captivating sunset you’ve ever seen. Finally, we’ll reach our desert camp, complete with comfy tents and a bonfire where local Berbers will entertain us with some traditional music under the stars. This night is one for the memory books.
activities_incl: Todra Valley and Gorges in Tinghir
Traditional Berber Music by the Bonfire

day5.title: Explore the Desert 4WDs, Sunset Meditations & Nomadic Tea Parties
day5.desc: Rise and shine, desert lovers! We recommend waking up early to catch the glorious sunrise near the camp and join a meditation session. We’ll fuel up with breakfast before heading off on our 4WD desert adventure. We’ll take you to the fascinating fossil area and visit nomadic families, where we’ll have the chance to learn all about their cattle-based lifestyle and enjoy some traditional tea. Afterwards, we’ll also explore the mysterious Mifiss Mines, an intriguing ghost town that used to be an active coal mine. Later in the afternoon you will be speeding down the dunes on a sandboard just as the sun begins to set. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to explore the desert like a true adventurer and experience some real Moroccan desert culture.

day6.title: Merzouga Desert, Rissani Market, Draa Valley, Ouarzazate
day6.desc: After breakfast in our hotel, we’re off to explore the bustling Rissani Market. These markets are high-energy traditional market with over 600 stalls, and their very own Donkey parking lot. Make sure to haggle with the local vendors and don’t forget to snag some traditional handicrafts, clothing, and jewellery. And because we like to keep things outdoorsy, we’ll grab some fresh food from the locals for a picnic lunch under the shade of acacia trees. Then we’ll hop back in the bus, driving through the picturesque Draa Valley, arriving at our destination for the night – Ouarzazate.

day7.title: Ouarzazate - Imlil & Movie Tour Day
day7.desc: Wake up and smell the fresh Moroccan coffee – it’s time for another adventure! After a delicious breakfast at the hotel, we’ll head to Atlas Studios. These studios are world-famous for being the filming locations of movies like The Mummy, Gladiator and The Hills Have Eyes. We’ll take you on a tour of the studios, revealing the secrets behind some of the most famous scenes in movie history. After the tour, it’s time to get back on the road and explore the majestic High Atlas Mountains – prepare for some jaw-dropping scenery. Finally, we’ll arrive at the tranquil village of Imlil nestled in the mountains, where our cosy homestay awaits us.

day8.title: Waterfall Hikes & Authentic Cooking Class with a Local Family
day8.desc: Today’s adventure begins with a refreshing trek to the stunning Imlil waterfalls. After the hike you’ll have time to have some lunch we’ll head back into the village to explore. Stroll through the local market and then get ready for a cooking class with a local family who will teach you the art of making Tagine and Couscous – two of the most famous dishes in Morocco. Finally, we’ll sit down and enjoy our tasty creations family-style. Bon appetit!

day9.title: Essaouira: Skala de la Ville & Surf Lesson
day9.desc: We’re off to the charming seaside town of Essaouira today and remember to pack your swimsuits and sunscreen. We’ll drive for about 3.5 hours through groves of olive and argan trees, arriving in time for an unforgettable adventure.First, we’ll explore the old town, Skala de la Ville, fishing port and historic medina – perfect for all your culture and travel needs. Feeling peckish? Essaouira is famous in Morocco for its seafood so we encourage you to join a fresh seafood lunch by the beach. Afterwards, time to hit the waves with a surf lesson in one of the best surf spots in the country. Finally, we’ll treat ourselves to dinner and drinks at one of Essaouira’s famous rooftop restaurants.

day10.title: From Essaouira to Marrakech: A Delicious Farewell
day10.desc: Before we bid adieu to Essaouira, we’ll make sure to squeeze in some last-minute shopping at the souks. Then, in the afternoon, we’ll gather for a fabulous farewell dinner in vibrant Marrakech.It’s the perfect time to reminisce about all those incredible experiences we’ve had on this tour. Cheers to an unforgettable journey!

day11.title: Marrakech - Goodbye
day11.desc: On the last day, we will arrange for your transfer from Marrakech to the airport, ensuring you get an easy and comfortable send off.We hope we have shown you why Morocco is a dream African destination and should be at the top of everyone’s bucket list. Have a safe journey to wherever you are off to next and always remember to #exploremore.

seo_data.meta_title: 14 Day Philippines Group Tour | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Embark on a 14-day Philippines group tour designed for solo travelers and young adults. Immerse yourself in 10+ activities, exquisite accommodations, and delightful meals, all wrapped up in one fantastic package.

open_graph.title: 14 Day Island Hopping Group Tour in Philippines with Beaches & Adventure | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: Embark on a 14-day Philippines group tour designed for solo travelers and young adults. Immerse yourself in 10+ activities, exquisite accommodations, and delightful meals, all wrapped up in one fantastic package.

tour_information.description: Embark on a 14-day Philippines group tour designed for solo travelers and young adults. Immerse yourself in 10+ activities, exquisite accommodations, and delightful meals, all wrapped up in one fantastic package.
activities_incl: 2 Day/1 Night island hopping and camping in Coron
Canopy Walk To Famous View Point

day1.title: Arrive in Manila!
day1.desc: Arrive at any time on day 1 and your guide will be there to meet you at the airport. Weave through the streets of one of Asia’s most frenetic cities straight to your accommodation. Time to settle in and meet the group! If you arrive earlier in the day, you can use your time to explore the city and do some last-minute shopping. In the evening we’ll get to know you over dinner and a few drinks.

day2.title: Palawan Here We Come!
day2.desc: We are heading to Palawan! Start your day with a leisurely breakfast, then take a short flight to Puerto Princesa. You'll have some free time to enjoy a refreshing swim in the pool, a relaxing massage or simply unwind. In the evening, we will dine at a local restaurant in this charming coastal city.

day3.title: Underground River Time!
day3.desc: Start the day early with a trip to the UNESCO-listed Underground River, exploring its winding caves and hidden chambers by boat. Then, journey along dirt roads to the remote fishing village of Port Barton, where paradise truly begins. Spend the afternoon relaxing on golden sand, sipping fresh coconuts, and soaking up island vibes. Tonight, drift off to the sound of the ocean in a traditional Filipino beach bungalow.

day6.title: Bound For El Nido
day6.desc: After breakfast, take some time to appreciate your spectacular surroundings before we then hop into a van and head up on our way to El Nido. When we arrive you will see why Palawan was named the most beautiful island group in the world. Surrounded by islands and towering cliffs, El Nido is a secret paradise we are lucky enough to share. Once you pick your jaws up off the ground, we will check in to the funkiest hostel in Palawan.

day7.title: Cultural Day
day7.desc: Immerse yourself in Filipino culture with a short jungle hike, discovering the rich flora and fauna of the rainforest. Arrive at our exclusive beach hut for a hands-on day of activities—cook traditional Filipino dishes, climb coconut trees, learn stick fighting, try coconut leaf weaving, and take part in local dances and games. In the afternoon, relax on the stunning Las Cabanas Beach and soak in the breathtaking sunset. For those seeking adventure, an optional zip line offers the thrill of soaring between two islands over the ocean. An unforgettable day from start to finish.

day8.title: Island Hopping
day8.desc: This morning we board our boat to take us around all the spectacular, tiny islands in the bay. You will explore the most beautiful islands and the bluest waters you have ever seen. Snorkel with your new friends and feast on the freshly prepared food on board. This is truly a once-in-a-lifetime experience.

day9.title: El Nido Town
day9.desc: Today we do a short canopy walk up to the famous cliffs overlooking El Nido to get the best view of incredible bay and Cadlao Island. After all that exercise, you’ll need some chill-out time! That’s why we include a traditional Filipino massage near the beach to help ease those muscles. Take your time today to relax and enjoy your surroundings. Explore the town and meet some friendly locals.

day10.title: On The Coron
day10.desc: After breakfast pack your things and hop on the fast ferry to Coron. Check into our accomodation and take the evening to explore Coron town and the night life of live music and street food.

day11.title: Coron Free Day
day11.desc: Today is a day for you to spend at your leisure! Chill out at the accommodation or book an optional extra. Hike Mount Tapyas, visit Black Island or get some Scuba Diving in! The choice is yours.

day12.title: Coron Island Hopping & Camping
day12.desc: Spend the next two days exploring Coron’s top snorkeling spots with our local guides. Cruise past dramatic limestone cliffs and pristine beaches before diving into crystal-clear waters. Snorkel over the World War II-era Lusong Gunboat wreck, glide through vibrant coral reefs, and swim in the stunning twin lagoons. As the sun sets, unwind on Pass Island, where we’ll camp in beach huts and enjoy cocktails by the bonfire. Wake up to the sound of the waves, have breakfast on the beach, and get ready for another day of incredible water adventures.
day12.roomtype: Beach Huts on Pass Island – Dorm

day14.title: Tour Ends
day14.desc: Sadly all good things must come to an end! After breakfast we will take you to the airport in time to catch your flight out of Coron.
activities_incl: Airport Transfer to Fransisco B. Reyes Airport

seo_data.meta_title: 23 Day Philippines Small Group Tour | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: The Philippines is truly an unbeatable destination, if you’re into authentic experiences in the world’s most incredible tropical islands, then this is the trip for you.

open_graph.title: 23 Day Philippines Expedition Group Tour with Islands & Adventure | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: The Philippines is truly an unbeatable destination, if you’re into authentic experiences in the world’s most incredible tropical islands, then this is the trip for you.

tour_information.description: The Philippines is truly an unbeatable destination, if you’re into authentic experiences in the world’s most incredible tropical islands, then this is the trip for you.
activities_incl: SUP or Kayak on Loboc River

day11.desc: Today is a day for you to spend at your leisure! Chill out at the accommodation or book an optional extra. Hike Mount Tapyas, visit Black Island or get some Scuba Diving in! The choice is yours.

Wake up to the sound of the waves, have breakfast on the beach, and get ready for another day of incredible water adventures.
day12.roomtype: Beach Huts on Pass Island – Dorm

day14.title: On to Cebu!
day14.desc: Today it’s time to head to Philippines East where the second part of your tour will begin. Upon arrival in Cebu, you will be greeted at the airport. After settling into your accommodation, you can spend the day exploring Cebu City or take some time to rest and refresh. In the evening, you will join the rest of the group for a delicious welcome meal at one of our favorite spots.

day15.title: Moalboal Bound
day15.desc: Today we're hitting the road to Moalboal! Cruise through Cebu's gorgeous countryside to the magnificent Simala Shrine—where stunning architecture meets spiritual vibes. Then it's beachfront check-in time before the day's main event: swimming with THOUSANDS of sardines in their natural habitat! Keep your eyes peeled for sea turtles cruising through this underwater spectacle. This is the natural phenomenon everyone raves about—and you're about to see why!

day16.title: Cebu: Osmena Peak Sunrise & Chasing waterfalls
day16.desc: Rise early for a short hike to Osmena Peak, where you’ll catch a stunning sunrise over rugged hills. After taking in the views, enjoy a traditional Filipino breakfast at a local spot that supports community education. Then, cool off in a tropical swimming hole before heading back to Moalboal for a free afternoon to relax or explore.

day17.title: To Bohol
day17.desc: After breakfast, you will start your journey to Bohol. You will take the scenic route back to Cebu City and then take a ferry to Bohol, where you can relax and enjoy the sea views. In the afternoon, you will arrive at our accommodation. You can unwind by the pool or have a cocktail at Alona Beach, known for its stunning sunsets.

day18.title: Countryside Bohol
day18.desc: Explore Bohol’s stunning countryside, starting with panoramic views at the iconic Chocolate Hills. Drive through the Mahogany Forest before visiting the Tarsier Sanctuary to see these tiny primates up close. Enjoy lunch by the Loboc River, then paddle or kayak through its lush tropical surroundings. Wrap up the day with a hands-on workshop making traditional Filipino desserts.

day19.title: School Visit & Virgin Island Sunset Tour
day19.desc: Spend the morning visiting a local daycare in the Badjao Community, where you’ll connect with the kids and learn about their daily lives. In the afternoon, set off on a sunset tour through crystal-clear waters, stopping to snorkel among vibrant coral reefs. As the sun begins to set, arrive at Gak-Ang Island, a stunning white sandbar, for a breathtaking view. End the day with a traditional Filipino boodle fight dinner, sharing great food, drinks, and unforgettable moments.

day20.title: Explore the Island & Sunset Cruise
day20.desc: Fly to Boracay, home to powdery white sand, turquoise waters, and buzzing nightlife. After landing in Caticlan, take a quick trike ride, a short ferry trip, and a transfer to your accommodation for the next three nights. Settle in, then head out in the evening for a sunset sailing excursion, soaking in breathtaking views as the sun dips below the horizon.

day21.title: Motag Living Museum Cultural Day
day21.desc: Take a short ferry to the mainland and visit the Motag Living Museum, an exclusive cultural experience that offers a glimpse into traditional Filipino life. Meet locals and learn about their customs before heading back to Boracay in the afternoon. Spend the rest of the day relaxing on White Beach, enjoying an optional massage, or kayaking through crystal-clear waters.

day22.title: Hop On & Off Bus & Massage
day22.desc: Enjoy a slow morning at your own pace before setting off in the afternoon to explore Boracay’s hidden beaches with your Hop on Hop off bus pass. Discover secluded coves, quiet bays, and untouched shores, taking in the island’s natural beauty. Later, venture out with your group to find hidden gems, wander through local villages, and soak up the tropical scenery. End the day with a relaxing massage, the perfect way to unwind.

day23.title: Departure Day
day23.desc: Sadly, it’s time to bid farewell to this beautiful part of an amazing country. Hopefully, we will meet again, perhaps with new travel companions. After breakfast, the day is yours. You can choose to stay on in Boracay, or wrap up your three week dreamy Philippines holiday.

seo_data.meta_title: 13 Day South Korea Small Group Tour | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Experience the beauty of South Korea on our Backpacking tour! Explore serene temples, savour Korean cuisine, and enjoy adventures from Seoul's vibrant streets to Jeju's stunning beaches.

open_graph.title: 13 Day Group Tour in South Korea with Cities, Culture & Adventure | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: Experience the beauty of South Korea on our Backpacking tour! Explore serene temples, savour Korean cuisine, and enjoy adventures from Seoul's vibrant streets to Jeju's stunning beaches.

tour_information.description: Experience the beauty of South Korea on our Backpacking tour! Explore serene temples, savour Korean cuisine, and enjoy adventures from Seoul's vibrant streets to Jeju's stunning beaches.
activities_incl: Q&A session with North Korean Defector
Hanok Village walk, Makgoli Tasting Session

day1.title: Welcome to Korea!
day1.desc: Day 1 of your thrilling South Korean adventure begins with an exciting arrival at the hostel in the lively centre of Seoul's renowned shopping area, Myeongdong. As soon as you step out, the city's vibrant energy will captivate you, igniting your sense of adventure. Gather with your group for an orientation session, then head off for your first Korean meal at the included welcome dinner with your new companions! Following dinner, we’ll enjoy the best night views of the city lights from the summit of Namsan Mountain.

day2.title: K-pop dance class & HiKR Ground
day2.desc: After breakfast at the hostel, we'll head to the trendy neighbourhood of Hapjeong to kick off our day with a K-pop dance session! Learn from a professional dance instructor and choreographer, then explore the shops of Hongdae. We'll visit HiKR to discover the global K Wave phenomenon and record our own K-pop dance video! The afternoon is free for you to explore before we regroup for dinner and drinks in the lively Itaewon district.

day3.title: The Demilitarised Zone (DMZ)
day3.desc: Today will be a day on our tour that you'll never forget. You'll have the chance to peer into the Hermit Kingdom of North Korea when we take you to the incredible Demilitarized Zone (DMZ). Standing on the border between two worlds, you'll see the stark differences between North and South Korea. With our experienced guides, you'll explore tunnels dug by North Korea, hear stories of the area, and even talk with a North Korean defector as part of a cultural exchange. We'll return to Seoul around 4 pm, giving everyone time to freshen up before heading out for another fantastic Korean dinner!
activities_incl: Q&A session with North Korean defector

day4.title: Gyeongbokgung Palace, Insadong & food tour
day4.desc: Today, we'll explore Seoul's traditional areas, offering a different side of the city. Start with the changing of the guard ceremony at the magnificent Gyeongbokgung Palace, where you'll discover ancient courtyards, grand architecture, and serene gardens. You can even wear a traditional ‘hanbok’ for an authentic experience! Next, we'll stroll through the perfectly preserved Hanok Village and head to the lively Insadong art street. In the evening, your guide will take you on a street food tasting tour at the famous Gwangjang Market to sample some of the best street food in the city!

day5.title: Temple Time! Meditate, Chant, and Tea with a Monk
day5.desc: Prepare to immerse yourself in the tranquillity of a small, working temple nestled in the mountains outside Seoul. Surrounded by beautifully adorned temples and shrines, you'll feel worlds away from the city's hustle and bustle. Participate in temple life with a singing bowl meditation session, evening bell tolling, and prayer chanting. Enjoy a unique opportunity to have tea with a monk after your reflective, silent Buddhist dinner, where you can ask any burning questions about life. This is your chance to reset and recharge before continuing your adventure.

day6.title: Hanok Village Walk & Makgeolli Tasting
day6.desc: After morning chanting and a wholesome Buddhist breakfast, we'll say goodbye to our mountain retreat and head to Jeonju, known for its food, drink, and traditional village. After checking into our charming Hanok guesthouse, explore the afternoon at your leisure. Join the group for a Makgeolli tasting session at the Hanok, learning about its production and sampling various types. Those keen to continue can head to Makgeolli Alley to enjoy more rice wine and savour ‘anju’ – special foods made to accompany drinks!

day7.title: Bike Tour, Historical Sites, Anapji Pond by Night
day7.desc: After bidding farewell to Jeonju, we’ll catch a bus to Gyeongju, the ancient capital known as the "Museum Without Walls." This enchanting city is home to UNESCO World Heritage Sites, ancient temples, and royal tombs that tell stories of a distant past. Once we've dropped off our bags and freshened up, we’ll hop on bikes to explore the town, visiting tombs, burial mounds, and historical sites. In the evening, we’ll head to Anapji Pond to admire the mirrored reflections of the surrounding structures on the water.

day8.title: Bulguksa Temple & Taekwondo
day8.desc: Today, we continue exploring Gyeongju, starting with a visit to one of the country's most important temples, Bulguksa. Nestled in lush forests and scenic landscapes, this ancient temple is a masterpiece of architecture, history, and tranquillity. After freshening up at the accommodation, we’ll visit a Dojang to learn the art of Taekwondo, mastering high-flying kicks, fast punches, and precise movements from seasoned professionals. In the evening, join the group to check out some of the bars and restaurants in the old town.

day9.title: Markets, Cable Car & Karaoke!
day9.desc: Today, we head to Busan, a coastal city surrounded by beaches and mountains. After checking into our downtown accommodation, we’ll explore the famous Jagalchi market and shopping districts before riding the Songdo cable car for stunning views over the water and city. The afternoon is free for you to explore; consider visiting Gamcheon Cultural Village or relaxing in a jjimjilbang (public bathhouse). For our final night, we’ll gather in one of the city’s nightlife districts to sing the night away in a famous karaoke room with your family.

day10.title: On to Jeju Island!
day10.desc: The morning is yours until we board our flight and arrive in Jeju by early afternoon. After checking in, we'll find a place to eat and prepare for the exciting days of exploration ahead! Jeju Island offers a variety of activities and sights to enjoy.

day11.title: Lava Tubes and Hikes
day11.desc: You'll need a hearty breakfast this morning because we have an active day ahead! We'll start by boarding our private transport to the spectacular Manjangul Lava Tubes. Formed over 200,000 years ago, these tubes stretch over 7 kilometres, making them one of the world's longest lava tube systems. After exploring the underground, we'll head to the famous Seongsan Ilchulbong for brisk sea air and unbeatable views. Next, we'll visit the volcanic rock formations of Daepo Jusangjeolli Cliffs for some epic photos. After lunch, you can visit one of Jeju's famous beaches or waterfalls before we all meet at The Cliff for sunset drinks overlooking the ocean. The perfect way to end the day!

day12.title: The Big One - Olle Trail Hike & Jeongbang Waterfall
day12.desc: Today, we'll hike the breathtaking Olle Trail, covering various sections of the island. Expect sweeping ocean views, picturesque fields, charming villages, dramatic rock formations, and Jeju's most famous waterfall. Jeongbang Waterfall, a stunning 23-meter cascade that crashes onto the oceanfront rocks, is truly awe-inspiring. Spend the afternoon exploring at your leisure before gathering for a grand farewell dinner to bid goodbye to Jeju and South Korea!

day13.title: Farewell for now
day13.desc: It's time to bid farewell to this amazing country and its people. Enjoy one last breakfast with your travel companions before heading off.

seo_data.meta_title: 18 Day Group Tour in Thailand | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Get ready for the ultimate 18-day Thailand adventure! From temple hopping in Bangkok and floating bungalows in the jungle, to island parties, cooking classes, and elephant encounters—this trip covers it all. With a group

open_graph.title: 18 Day Small Group Adventure Tour in Thailand with Culture, Temples & Adventure | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: Get ready for the ultimate 18-day Thailand adventure! From temple hopping in Bangkok and floating bungalows in the jungle, to island parties, cooking classes, and elephant encounters—this trip covers it all. With a group

tour_information.description: Get ready for the ultimate 18-day Thailand adventure! From temple hopping in Bangkok and floating bungalows in the jungle, to island parties, cooking classes, and elephant encounters—this trip covers it all. With a group

day1.title: Arrive in Bangkok
day1.desc: Touch down in buzzing Bangkok! We’ll be waiting at the airport to meet you and take you to your hotel in the heart of the city. After settling in, relax and recharge before meeting your new travel fam over a welcome dinner and drinks.

day2.title: Temples, Tuk Tuks & Party Time
day2.desc: Kick off your trip with a chilled boat cruise through Bangkok’s canals followed by a tuk tuk tour to explore the city’s ancient temples and landmarks. Experience the local culture and chaos. By night, we’ll dive into Bangkok’s legendary nightlife with rooftop bars, street food, and neon-lit adventures.

day3.title: Thai Cooking & Overnight Train
day3.desc: Today we head to a local kitchen to learn the secrets of Thai cooking with a hands-on class. After tasting your creations, it’s time to board the overnight sleeper train heading south—an experience in itself as we roll through rural Thailand under the stars.

day4.title: Floating Bungalows in Khao Sok
day4.desc: We arrive in stunning Khao Sok National Park and cruise across a hidden lake to reach our floating bungalows. This is true rainforest bliss. Spend the afternoon kayaking, tubing, or just soaking in the views. At night, sleep under the stars surrounded by jungle sounds.

day5.title: Tropical Paradise
day5.desc: We head to Koh Phangan, one of Thailand’s most famous islands. Check into our beachfront resort and spend the day soaking up the sun, sipping coconuts, and snapping your first island sunset before joining a beach party to kick things off.

day6.title: Beach Day & Thai Massage
day6.desc: Today is all about relaxation. Chill on the sand, float in the sea, or grab a fresh fruit shake. Then enjoy a traditional Thai massage to stretch out and unwind. Optional yoga or beach games in the afternoon.

day7.title: Island Tour & Beach BBQ
day7.desc: Explore the hidden gems of Koh Phangan with an island tour to lesser-known beaches and coves. Swim, snorkel, and enjoy picture-perfect views. Tonight, it’s BBQ time with grilled favourites served right on the beach.

day8.title: Muay Thai or Yoga
day8.desc: Choose your own adventure—test your skills with a Muay Thai class or find your flow with a peaceful yoga session. Either way, you’ll feel energized. Tonight is our final night in Koh Phangan, so let’s go out with a bang!

day9.title: Travel to Phi Phi
day9.desc: It’s a travel day as we hop ferries and cross the sea to reach the world-famous Phi Phi Islands. After checking in, we’ll head out for dinner and drinks before a beach party under the stars.

day10.title: Phi Phi Islands Experience
day10.desc: One of the trip highlights! We’ll sail around Phi Phi Leh with stops for kayaking, snorkelling, and swimming in turquoise bays. Enjoy dinner onboard and a magical night swim with glowing plankton (seasonal).

day11.title: Viewpoints & Paradise Islands
day11.desc: Start the day with a sunrise hike to Phi Phi’s famous viewpoint, then set off for more island hopping and snorkelling on a private boat tour. Relax on white sand beaches before a final Phi Phi dinner and party.

day12.title: Head to Phuket
day12.desc: Say goodbye to island life as we travel to Phuket. After checking in, explore the town or relax on the beach. Sunset drinks optional (but encouraged!).

day13.title: Fly to Chiang Mai
day13.desc: Today we fly north to the cultural heart of Thailand—Chiang Mai. Once we arrive, get settled and explore the old city or hit up the bustling night markets for food and souvenirs.

day14.title: Temples, Waterfalls & Local Farm Visit
day14.desc: Discover Chiang Mai’s rich heritage with a visit to the iconic Doi Suthep Temple. Then cool off at the ‘sticky’ waterfalls before heading to a local farm to learn about traditional Thai agriculture. A full, fun day packed with culture and nature.

day15.title: Hill Tribe Jungle Trek
day15.desc: Lace up your boots for an overnight jungle trek. Walk through rice paddies, forests, and mountain trails before reaching a hill tribe village. Spend the evening enjoying local food and sharing stories by the fire.

day16.title: Bamboo Rafting Adventure
day16.desc: Wake up to mountain air, then finish the trek with a bamboo rafting trip down a peaceful river. Return to Chiang Mai and enjoy your final free evening in the city with your group.

day17.title: Elephant Sanctuary
day17.desc: A heartwarming day at an ethical elephant sanctuary. Learn about elephant conservation and see these gentle giants roam free. You’ll have time to interact, observe, and understand their important role in Thai culture.

day18.title: Onward Travel
day18.desc: Your Thailand adventure wraps up today. Whether you’re heading home or travelling onward, your group leader will help with all your next steps. Time to say goodbye (for now) to your new friends and the adventure of a lifetime!

seo_data.meta_title: 14 Day Group Tour in Thailand | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Join our 14-day Backpacking Thailand Island Paradise tour. Perfect for solo travelers aged 20-45. Explore Bangkok, Phuket, Khao Sok, Koh Phi Phi, and Railay Beach. 17 activities, beaches and adventures.

open_graph.title: 14 Day Small Group Adventure Tour in Thailand with Island Hopping & Beaches | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: Join our 14-day Thailand Island Paradise tour. Perfect for solo travelers aged 20-45. 17 activities, beaches, nightlife, expert guides. Book now!

tour_information.description: Join our 14-day Backpacking Thailand Island Paradise tour. Perfect for solo travelers aged 20-45. Explore Bangkok, Phuket, Khao Sok, Koh Phi Phi, and Railay Beach. 17 activities, beaches and adventures.

day1.title: Bangkok - Welcome to Thailand
day1.desc: Let your Thailand adventure begin! We pick you up at the airport and head to your hotel. You'll then set off for a night on Khao San Road. Arriving early? No problem. Spend the day shopping at Khao San Road (walking distance from the hotel) or soak up the sun by the hotel pool.

day2.title: Floating Market & Monk Merit
day2.desc: Our adventure continues as we explore Thailand's iconic Amphawa Floating Market, where dozens of vibrant stalls offer everything from sweet grilled meats to unique, locally-made handicrafts and clothing—perfect for gifts. After soaking in the market's lively atmosphere, we'll visit the majestic Phra Pathom Chedi.

day3.title: Khao Sok: Floating Bungalows
day3.desc: Floating is the theme of the day! We head to the ever-stunning Khao Sok National Park for a day of kayaks and floating wooden bungalows. Your door is just steps from the crystal-clear waters of Cheow Lan Lake, surrounded by towering limestone formations wrapped in dense jungle. After the activities, sunbathing and floating beverages are suggested before we sit for a delicious family-style meal.

day4.title: Krabi: Free Time
day4.desc: Welcome to Krabi, home to Thailand's most famous and beautiful beaches. This sleepy beach town looks out over the teal-blue water of the Andaman Ocean and offers a variety of outdoor activities to enjoy. Our resort is just a minute's walk from the beach; there is a hotel bar - in the pool - and the nightlife leaves absolutely nothing to be desired! This is about as close to paradise as you get.

day5.title: Mangrove Kayak Adventure
day5.desc: Enjoy a guided paddle along the crystal-clear water of Krabi's surrounding jungle and hop in for some cool-down swims along the way. You will not believe how pristine and clear this emerald-coloured river is in real life. Then, free time by the pool or head down to the beach. Downtown Krabi is just a short walk away and offers plenty more to do if you wake up feeling active. You can make the rest of this day as active or relaxed as you wish.

day6.title: Railay Beach
day6.desc: Another day, another epic Thai beach. Only accessible by longtail boat, we get dropped off on the white sands of Railay Beach, surrounded by stunning limestone cliffs. This hidden paradise is surrounded by these mountainous formations, and the locals pull up their boats to serve a variety of Thai and Western lunch options. Rock climbing is optional but highly suggested.

day7.title: Tiger Cave Temple
day7.desc: Take a break from beach time and climb the 1,237 steps to the top of Tiger Cave Temple. You will be greeted by the dozens of families of monkeys that call this area home and a breathtaking view from the summit lookout point. Get up close and personal for some unique photo opportunities with these curious, jungle-dwelling mammals or step back and enjoy the show. After, we head back to the resort for some post-trek poolside relaxation and perhaps even some afternoon cocktails.

day8.title: Free Time in Krabi
day8.desc: Krabi is home to some of the best beaches in Thailand, and you have nearly a week to enjoy them. This sleepy beach town looks out over the teal-blue water of the Andaman Ocean and offers a variety of outdoor activities to enjoy. Our resort is just a minute's walk from the beach; there is a hotel bar - in the pool - and the nightlife leaves absolutely nothing to be desired! This is about as close to paradise as you get.

day9.title: Island Hopping: Maya Bay & More
day9.desc: We head out for some island hopping to visit some of Thailand's most beautiful islands. Your privately reserved speed boat brings you and your travel mates to all the must-see spots for a full day of adventure. Snorkel in the crystal clear water and enjoy a traditional Thai meal for lunch served on the boat's deck. The trip concludes on the stunning island of Koh Phi Phi Don, which you will call home for the next two nights.

day10.title: Phi Phi Island: View Point Trek
day10.desc: Relax and enjoy the last of your time on Koh Phi Phi. Grab breakfast and a fruit shake, and take in the stunning place you just called home for three days. Not to worry, your Thailand beach time isn't over yet! We head back to the resort in Krabi for a couple more days of activities. Rest poolside, hit the beach, or head into town - the choice is yours.

day11.title: Phi Phi Island
day11.desc: Time to get on that island time! Enjoy your free time on the picturesque island of Koh Phi Phi. Mingle with the many other backpackers who make their way to the island, set up on the beach, or take the hike to the lookout for one of the most iconic photo stops in all of Thailand. As the day winds down, we'll catch the ferry to Phuket, where your next adventure begins.

day12.title: Phuket: Patong Beach
day12.desc: Incredible beaches and wild nightlife collide on this vibrant island like no other. Welcome to Thailand's largest island, Phuket! (Pronounced: Poo-ket). We'll organise a beach trip. We have plenty of free time to go shopping. The day is yours to explore and enjoy.

day13.title: Free Time in Phuket
day13.desc: Phuket’s got a beach for every vibe, and today’s all yours to explore. Lounge by the hotel pool, hit up the island’s waterparks for some splashy fun, or dive into the local food scene at quirky cafes and bustling restaurants. Shopping? Plenty of that too—think street markets and shiny malls. Whether you’re chasing sunsets or good times, Phuket’s got you covered!

day14.title: Phuket: Until Next Time
day14.desc: Your Thailand tour is over, but the past 11 days will stick with you for a lifetime. You can use the hotel's facilities until your departure, including the pool and bag storage room. Get in one last breakfast together before you head to the airport. Your guide can arrange transfers to the International Airport in Phuket. Some will continue in their journey, while others will head back home. No matter your choice, this is hopefully the beginning of many future adventures!

seo_data.meta_title: 5 Day Full Moon Party Thailand Tour | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Join our 5-day Full Moon Party tour in Thailand! Explore Koh Tao and Koh Phangan’s famous nightlife, beaches, adventure, and unforgettable parties. Book your 2025/2026 trip now!

open_graph.title: 5 Day Full Moon Party Tour in Thailand | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: Join our 5-day Full Moon Party tour in Thailand. Explore Koh Tao and Koh Phangan’s famous nightlife, beaches, adventure, and unforgettable parties. Book your 2025/2026 trip now!

tour_information.description: Join our 5-day Full Moon Party tour in Thailand! Explore Koh Tao and Koh Phangan’s famous nightlife, beaches, adventure, and unforgettable parties. Book your 2025/2026 trip now!
excluded_items: National Park Entrance Fee (About 6 GBP/8 USD)
activities_incl: Snorkelling Trip at Koh Nangyuan/ Koh Tao

day1.title: Island Vibes Arrival
day1.desc: Start your adventure with a transfer to Koh Phangan from Surat Thani Airport, Surat Thani Train Station, or your hotel in Surat Thani Town. Settle in and prepare for the exciting days ahead.

day2.title: Dive into Island Hopping Fun!
day2.desc: Begin your day early with a pick-up and transfer to the pier. Embark on a day of island hopping, starting with snorkeling at Koh Tao. Explore the vibrant underwater world or relax on the pristine beaches of Koh Nangyuan. Take in breathtaking views from a famous viewpoint before returning in the evening.

day3.title: Full Moon Madness!
day3.desc: Enjoy some free time during the day, and make sure you're ready for the party of a lifetime later! The world-renowned Full Moon Party is famous for its festival atmosphere, bargain booze buckets, and wild antics—flaming skipping rope. Anyone? One drink is included to kick off the night.

day4.title: Chill & Recharge
day4.desc: After the excitement of the Full Moon Party, unwind with a relaxing beach day. Lounge on the soft sands, take a dip in the clear waters, or explore the island at your leisure. This day is all about recharging and soaking in the peaceful island vibes.

day5.title: Farewell to Paradise
day5.desc: As your Koh Phangan adventure wraps up, enjoy a final morning in paradise before your transfer to Surat Thani Airport. Reflect on your amazing experiences, from snorkeling to partying under the moon. Leave with cherished memories and the promise of a return visit.

seo_data.meta_title: Film & Photography Thailand
seo_data.meta_description: Capture Thailand’s most breathtaking mountain landscapes while traveling with a group of fellow video creators & photographers.

open_graph.title: Film & Photography Thailand
open_graph.description: Capture Thailand’s most breathtaking mountain landscapes while traveling with a group of fellow video creators & photographers. This 11-day photography & filmmaking tour is built entirely around getting “the shot” - from sunrise timelapses in mist-covered valleys to golden hour portraits at epic viewpoints. We travel slowly, stay in photogenic accommodations, and make time for editing and storytelling. Expect a mix of fancy hotels, boutique stays, and immersive local experiences like camping under the stars where most toursist don’t go. This is not a rushed tourist trip - it’s a creator-focused journey where every location is chosen for its cinematic potential.

tour_information.description: Capture Thailand’s most breathtaking mountain landscapes while traveling with a group of fellow video creators & photographers.
included_items: Travel & shoot alongside Pascal Basel (200K+ YouTube subscribers)
Learn travel filmmaking, vlogging, and photography directly on location
activities_incl: Sunrise Shoot at Yun Lai Viewpoint
Sunrise Hike at Phu Chi Fah
Sunrise Hike at Doi Pha Tang
Cloud Storage to Exchange Footage between Travelers

day1.title: Chiang Mai Arrival & Old Town Exploration
day1.desc: Welcome to Northern Thailand! Upon arrival in Chiang Mai, you’ll check into your hotel in the historic Old Town - a perfect base for exploring the city’s most iconic temples and photogenic streets. In the afternoon, we’ll do a light walking tour, visiting sites like Wat Phra Singh and Wat Chedi Luang. In the evening, enjoy a traditional Khantoke dinner with cultural performances - a great chance to connect with your fellow creators.

day2.title: Sunrise Hike & City Vibes
day2.desc: An early start takes us on a 30-minute hike to Doi Pui Summit for one of Pascals favorite sunrise spots, with sweeping views perfect for both stills and video. On the way back, we’ll visit Doi Pui Village for breakfast and stop at the famous Doi Suthep temple. The afternoon is free for markets, street food, or exploring Chiang Mai’s vibrant lanes.
day2.roomtype: Sunrise Hike, Temple visits, Market Exploration

day3.title: Chiang Mai to Pai
day3.desc: Today we begin our road trip into the mountains. Along the way, we’ll stop at Mok Fa Waterfall for a refreshing break. In Pai, check into the stylish Hotel des Artists and capture sunset at Pai Canyon.

day4.title: Misty Sunrise in Pai
day4.desc: We head to Yun Lai Viewpoint before dawn for dreamy mist-and-drone footage. After breakfast back at the hotel, you can choose to visit hot springs, the bamboo bridge, or relax and enjoy Pai’s easygoing atmosphere while joining Pascal for a casual editing session or shot review. Evening is free to explore the night market.

day5.title: Pai → Ban Jabo → Ban Rak Thai
day5.desc: Depart at 4:00 AM for a spectacular sunrise above the clouds at Ban Jabo. After coffee at a mountainside café, we continue to Ban Rak Thai - a Chinese (yet, in Thailand) mountain village famous for its lake and tea plantations. Check into the stunning Lee Wine Resort and capture golden hour over the lake.
day5.roomtype: Luxury boutique (Lee Wine Resort Ban Rak Thai)

day6.title: Ban Rak Thai to Chiang Dao
day6.desc: Wake up to sunrise views from your room’s balcony (Sunrise time in this village is stunning - you won’t want to leave!). After breakfast and optional tea tasting or boat ride, we drive to Chiang Dao, checking into a mountain-view lodge. The rest of the day is relaxed, giving you time to edit footage or explore nearby nature.

day7.title: Chiang Dao to Chiang Rai
day7.desc: Today’s highlight is the sunrise around Doi Chiang Dao. It’s a stunning mountain with perfect views. From there, we stop at Huai San Reservoir, where water appears to float over the road - great for some more shots. We continue to Chiang Rai and check into the Blue Lagoon Hotel for a relaxed evening.

day8.title: Chiang Rai to Phu Chi Fah
day8.desc: Morning visit to the striking White Temple before continuing through scenic mountain roads to beautiful Phu Chi Fah. In the afternoon, settle into your mountain lodge near the viewpoint and enjoy some free time to take in the surroundings. Dinner is a Thai BBQ (Moo Kata) served under the stars.

day9.title: Sunrise at Phu Chi Fah & Doi Pha Tang
day9.desc: A pre-dawn start for the famous Phu Chi Fah sunrise hike (~ 30min). Capture the sunrise shoulder-to-shoulder with Pascal and the group. After a yummy Thai-mountain breakfast, we drive to the Doi Pha Tang area, where we stay in a camp to be close to tomorrow’s sunrise spot. Evening is free to rest.

day10.title: Sunrise at Doi Pha Tang & Return to Chiang Mai
day10.desc: In the morning, we take another short sunrise hike of around 30 minutes to Doi Pha Tang, where stunning views of misty valleys and golden peaks await. After breakfast, we drive back toward Chiang Mai, stopping at Akha FarmVille for coffee and photos. On arrival, check in to the hotel before a farewell dinner to celebrate the journey.

day11.title: Chiang Mai Last Day
day11.desc: Enjoy a relaxed breakfast at your hotel before spending the morning at leisure. Take time to wander the streets, pick up last-minute souvenirs, or simply soak in the charm of Chiang Mai before your onward journey.

seo_data.meta_title: 10 Day Australia Small Group Tour | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Backpack the East Coast of Australia from Sydney to Brisbane. Explore beaches, surf, party, and kick off your Aussie adventure the right way.

open_graph.title: 10 Day East Coast Australia Group Tour with Surfing, Reefs & Adventure | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: Backpack the East Coast of Australia from Sydney to Brisbane. Explore beaches, surf, party, and kick off your Aussie adventure the right way.

tour_information.description: Backpack the East Coast of Australia from Sydney to Brisbane. Explore beaches, surf, party, and kick off your Aussie adventure the right way.
activities_incl: Bondi to Coogee Walk & Beach BBQ

day1.title: Welcome to Oz
day1.desc: Land in Sydney and meet your travel crew. You'll have time to settle in, shake off the jet lag, and start getting to know everyone. Tonight is all about relaxing, connecting with the group, and getting excited for the epic month ahead.

day2.title: Explore Sydney & Night Out
day2.desc: Start the day exploring Sydney with a guided city tour. Check out iconic landmarks like the Opera House, Harbour Bridge, and Circular Quay, then dive into local culture and street life. Tonight, we head out for a welcome dinner and drinks. Get ready to experience Sydney’s nightlife!

day3.title: Bondi Beach & Coogee Walk
day3.desc: No visit to Sydney is complete without a day at Bondi. Go for a swim or just soak up the sun before we set off on the famous Bondi to Coogee coastal walk. We’ll finish the day with a beach BBQ and cold beers. Then it's onto the overnight bus to Byron Bay—next stop: surf town vibes.

day4.title: Byron Bay Vibes
day4.desc: Wake up in Byron Bay, Australia’s boho beach capital. After checking into our accommodation, explore the local markets, grab a smoothie, or relax on the beach. Later, we’ll head out for a night of live music, beach bars, and epic energy.

day5.title: Learn to Surf & Chill
day5.desc: This morning, it’s surf time! Learn to ride the waves with local instructors. Whether you’re a total beginner or just brushing up, you’ll have a blast. Afterward, wind down with a guided yoga session by the beach—pure Byron bliss.

day6.title: Lighthouse Sunrise Hike
day6.desc: Early rise for a sunrise hike to Cape Byron Lighthouse, the most easterly point of Australia. The views are unreal. Spend the rest of the day chilling on the beach, checking out shops, or heading out for optional activities like kayaking with dolphins.

day7.title: Surfers Paradise Arrival
day7.desc: We make our way up the coast to Surfers Paradise on the Gold Coast. This place is buzzing with nightlife, golden beaches, and awesome energy. Get settled, explore the area, and if you're here on a Working Holiday Visa, now’s the time to start getting set up.

day8.title: Jet Boats & Big Nights
day8.desc: Strap in for an adrenaline-pumping jet boat ride across the Gold Coast’s stunning waterways. High-speed spins, jumps, and splashes included. Later, we’re going out to experience the party scene Surfers Paradise is famous for.

day9.title: Explore Brisbane
day9.desc: Head north to Brisbane and kick things off with a guided city tour. See the highlights, from botanical gardens to South Bank, and take some time to chill at the urban beach known as The Lagoon.

day10.title: Wrap Up in Brisbane
day10.desc: Your epic Aussie adventure ends this morning in Brisbane. Need help with onward travel or finding work? We've got you covered for the rest of your time Down Under. Heading back to Sydney? We've got options for that too.

seo_data.meta_title: 28 Day East Coast Australia Group Tour | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Experience Australia’s East Coast in 28 days. From Sydney to Cairns, explore beaches, reefs, islands, and rainforests on the ultimate backpacking trip.

open_graph.title: 28 Day East Coast Australia Group Tour with Surfing, Islands & Reefs | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: Experience Australia’s East Coast in 28 days. From Sydney to Cairns, explore beaches, reefs, islands, and rainforests on the ultimate backpacking trip.

tour_information.description: Experience Australia’s East Coast in 28 days. From Sydney to Cairns, explore beaches, reefs, islands, and rainforests on the ultimate backpacking trip.
activities_incl: Bondi to Coogee Walk & Beach BBQ
2 Nights Magnetic Island with Ferry Transfers
Full Day Snorkelling Great Barrier Reef at 2 Outer Reef Locations

day7.desc: We make our way up the coast to Surfers Paradise on the Gold Coast. This place is buzzing with nightlife, golden beaches, and awesome energy. Get settled, explore the area, and if you're here on a Working Holiday Visa, now’s the time to start getting set up.

day8.title: Jet Boats & Big Nights
day8.desc: Strap in for an adrenaline-pumping jet boat ride across the Gold Coast’s stunning waterways. High-speed spins, jumps, and splashes included. Later, we’re going out to experience the party scene Surfers Paradise is famous for.

day9.title: Explore Brisbane
day9.desc: Head north to Brisbane and kick things off with a guided city tour. See the highlights, from botanical gardens to South Bank, and take some time to chill at the urban beach known as The Lagoon.

day10.title: Free Day in Brisbane
day10.desc: It’s your day, your way. Visit the world-famous Australia Zoo, hit up a gallery, or spend the day lounging by the water. In the evening, the group will head out to Fortitude Valley—Brisbane’s nightlife hotspot—for drinks and dancing.

day11.title: Relax in Rainbow Beach
day11.desc: We make our way to Rainbow Beach, a laid-back town known for its epic coastline and chilled atmosphere. Relax on the sand or get prepped for the next few days—your Fraser Island adventure is just around the corner.

day12.title: K’gari 4WD Island Adventure
day12.desc: Time to go off-road! Join a 4WD tag-along tour across K’gari (Fraser Island), the largest sand island in the world. Swim in the crystal-clear waters of Lake McKenzie, float down Eli Creek, and chill in the natural spa of Champagne Pools. Camp out under the stars and spot wild dingoes. This is raw Aussie nature at its best.

day15.title: Back to Rainbow Beach
day15.desc: Return to Rainbow Beach and take the afternoon to recharge. Check out the multicoloured sand cliffs or grab a bite with the crew before catching the overnight bus to Airlie Beach.

day16.title: Discover Airlie Beach
day16.desc: Arrive in tropical Airlie Beach and check into our accommodation. Head to the lagoon to relax or go all-out with an optional scenic flight over the Whitsundays and the Great Barrier Reef.

day17.title: Sail the Whitsundays
day17.desc: Board our boat and set sail through the Whitsundays—74 tropical islands of pure paradise. Snorkel colourful coral reefs, lounge on deck, and visit the world-famous Whitehaven Beach. Sleep on board and wake up in ocean bliss.

day20.title: Magnetic Island Escape
day20.desc: Catch the ferry to Magnetic Island, where beachside huts and hidden trails await. Chill in hammocks, explore WWII forts on the Forts Walk, and spot wild koalas and wallabies. Don’t forget to check out the island’s epic sunset spots.
activities_incl: 2 Nights Magnetic Island with Ferry Transfers

day22.title: Mission Beach Chill & Thrills
day22.desc: Next up: Mission Beach. This peaceful beach town is perfect for relaxing—or pushing your limits. Optional skydiving from 15,000ft or white-water rafting through the Tully River rainforest are on offer. End the day with a beach BBQ and some well-earned chill time.

day24.title: Welcome to Cairns
day24.desc: Arrive in Cairns, the backpacker capital of Oz. Settle into the tropical vibes, explore the lagoon, and chat with your group leader about all the epic adventures still to come. Whether you’re chasing more adrenaline or just want to relax, Cairns is the perfect base to keep the good times rolling.

day25.title: Snorkel the Great Barrier Reef
day25.desc: Today’s the big one. Set out on a full-day trip to the Great Barrier Reef. Snorkel two outer reef locations and swim alongside marine life in this World Heritage site. It’s a true bucket-list moment.
activities_incl: Full Day Snorkelling Great Barrier Reef at 2 Outer Reef Locations

day26.title: Free Day in Cairns
day26.desc: You’ve earned a rest—or more adventure. Optional activities include bungee jumping, waterfall chasing, or more snorkelling. Do your thing, your way.

day27.title: Atherton Tablelands Adventure
day27.desc: Today we hit the Atherton Tablelands, a lush region packed with waterfalls, crater lakes, and epic natural slides. Swim in Millaa Millaa Falls and learn about the region’s unique landscape from our guide. Tonight, we’ll celebrate with a farewell dinner and drinks.

day28.title: Farewell & Onward Travel
day28.desc: After nearly a month of sun, surf, and good times, it’s time to say goodbye. Check out in the morning, but don’t worry—we’re still here to help with whatever’s next in your Aussie journey.

seo_data.meta_title: 18 Day Small Group Tour in Bali | Backpacking Tours
seo_data.meta_description: Join our 18-day Bali group tour. Perfect for solo travelers aged 20-45. Visit Ubud, Gili T, Canggu, Nusa Lembongan, Uluwatu, Seminyak. Meet new people, over 30 activities. Book 2025/2026!

open_graph.title: 18 Day Group Adventure Tour in Bali with Temples, Beaches & Island Hopping | Backpacking Tours
open_graph.description: Join our 18-day Bali group tour. Perfect for solo travelers aged 20-45. Visit Ubud, Gili T, Canggu, Nusa Lembongan, Uluwatu, Seminyak. Meet new people, over 30 activities.

tour_information.description: Join our 18-day Bali group tour. Perfect for solo travelers aged 20-45. Visit Ubud, Gili T, Canggu, Nusa Lembongan, Uluwatu, Seminyak. Meet new people, over 30 activities. Book 2025/2026!

day1.title: Bali Beginnings
day1.desc: Time to begin your Bali tour! Settle in at the hotel, meet your tour guide, and get to know your travel mates before a complimentary welcome dinner that samples Bali's most delicious dishes. Then, a night out in the beach town of Kuta.

day2.title: Cliffside Temples Of Uluwatu
day2.desc: Soak in the sights of Bali’s 1000 year-old, cliffside temple - Uluwatu! We make the most of the morning exploring before heading for a language lesson to set you up for the trip. Then some quality beach time on one of Bali's most scenic beaches. Sunset beer me, please!

day3.title: Surf's Up & Tanah Lot Temple
day3.desc: Bali is a world-renowned paradise for surfers. The sandy bottoms and slow-moving surf of Kuta make it the ideal place for your surfing lesson. Then, to Tanah Lot Temple for sunset. This is one of Bali's famous Seven Sea Hindu Temples - with all seven constructed within eyesight to the next to form a chain that is believed to protect the coast from invaders. Then to Canggu - one of Bali's most laid-back beach towns.

day4.title: Chill Time In Canggu
day4.desc: Off to the beach with your new travel mates! Or maybe the rooftop pool at the hotel. Get up early for some yoga or make the most of being in one of Bali's surfing hotspots. Canggu is Bali's most chilled-out beach town and the ideal place to make this day as active or lazy as you'd like.

day5.title: Dream Beach In Nusa Lembongan
day5.desc: We head to catch the ferry and begin two days of teal-green water and white sand at our favourite hillside hideout in Nusa Lembongan. Here, you'll spend your days settling into the Bali lifestyle. Dream Beach? Every bit as stunning as it sounds and just one of dozens of beaches to explore. Then off to Devil's Tear for yet another epic Bali sunset!

day6.title: Mangrove SUP Adventure
day6.desc: After breakfast, we head to the sprawling mangroves of Nusa Lembongan. That's where you begin your standup paddleboard (SUP) tour through this ecological wonder. Tropical setting, new mates, stunning scenery, and one incredibly unique way to spend the morning. Then back to the hotel where you take the reigns of your day.

day7.title: Ubud's Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary
day7.desc: Ubud is the epicenter of Balinese culture where hundreds of Hindu temples intertwine with top-notch restaurants, sprawling markets, dozens of yoga studios, and unrivaled natural beauty. After catching the ferry from Nusa, we head to backpacker hotspot and spend the afternoon with a venture through the Sacred Monkey Forest Sanctuary.
